definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The first film is tentatively scheduled to hit theaters in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 而三部曲的第一部暫定將於2009年上映。

sentences.english: And together they're going to form a trilogy which feed off each other.
sentences.chinese: 他們將一起組成一個交相輝映的三部曲。

sentences.english: The mysterious figure of the answer to the trilogy was only the third kick.
sentences.chinese: 這個神祕人物的謎底到了三部曲的第三部才被揭開。

sentences.english: Therefore, the last three symphonies are called "thespian trilogy".
sentences.chinese: 因此，後人也稱這後三部交響曲爲“悲劇三部曲”。

sentences.english: 《Cats and Mouses》 is the second literature work of Grass' three works.
sentences.chinese: 《貓與鼠》是格拉斯《但澤三部曲》的第二部。

sentences.english: In the musical form structure uses the trilogy type.
sentences.chinese: 在曲式結構上，多采用三部曲式。

sentences.english: I want to begin today with concluding Aristotle part3.
sentences.chinese: 我今天要以總結亞里士多德第三部曲收尾。

sentences.english: The Lord of the Rings trilogy.
sentences.chinese: 觀看完魔戒三部曲的時間。

sentences.english: The Human Stain is Roth's contribution which completes his famous thematic"American Trilogy".
sentences.chinese: 《人性的污點》是羅斯的“美國三部曲”的完結篇。

sentences.english: Chewbacca nonetheless returned thanks to the prequel trilogy.
sentences.chinese: 不過，幸虧有前傳三部曲，丘巴卡又回來了。

sentences.english: The most crippling weakness of the trilogy, however, is its hero.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，三部曲最嚴重的缺陷在於書中的男主人公。

sentences.english: Miniature photography for the trilogy took up a total of 988 days.
sentences.chinese: 三部曲中小模型的製作以及拍攝用去了988天。

sentences.english: It could be a three parter called "Ruler of the Bracelet".
sentences.chinese: 我們可以把這個故事拍成一個手鐲之王三部曲。

sentences.english: The climatic final part of the Woodman's trilogy.
sentences.chinese: 最後一部分的氣候的樵夫的三部曲。

sentences.english: All three movies in The Lord of the Rings series were filmed in New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 《指環王》三部曲均在新西蘭拍攝。

sentences.english: Neuromancer was his first, and is the start of the Span trilogy.
sentences.chinese: 《明日聚會》是吉布森橋三部曲第三部。
